Module dunemasking
Package dunemask.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • dunemask.util.FileUtil
  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Dunemasking FileUtil for easy editing and changing of filesv

    Test In List: dunemask.util.FileUtil#alreadyInFile(File, String)

    Remove Extension From File: dunemask.util.FileUtil#removeExtension(String)

    Change File Extension: dunemask.util.FileUtil#changeExtension(String, String)

    Get Number of Lines In File: linesInFile(File)

    Change FilePath Folder Handling: filePathFix(String)

    Find Certain Text In Document: dunemask.util.FileUtil#findInDocument(File, String)

    Get SubFiles: getAllSubFiles(File)

    Return Next Free Line In File: dunemask.util.FileUtil#nextFreeLine(File)

    Get File From URL: getWebFile(String)

    Write File from File: writeFile(File, File)

    Author:
    Elijah
